class.rdfs:comment: The anatomical location at which two or more bones make contact.
class.rdfs:label: Joint

schema:biomechnicalClass.rdfs:comment: The biomechanical properties of the bone.
schema:biomechnicalClass.rdfs:label: biomechnicalClass

schema:functionalClass.rdfs:comment: The degree of mobility the joint allows.
schema:functionalClass.rdfs:label: functionalClass

schema:structuralClass.rdfs:comment: The name given to how bone physically connects to each other.
schema:structuralClass.rdfs:label: structuralClass
